mapper.select: SELECT SLT.ID id, SLT.SOURCE_TYPE sourceType, SLT.SOURCE_LABEL sourceLabel, SLT.SOURCE_NAME sourceName, SLT.ATTACHMENT_ID attachmentId, SLT.SOURCE_WIDTH sourceWidth, SLT.SOURCE_HEIGHT sourceHeight, SLT.SOURCE_FORMAT sourceFormat, SLT.STATUS status, SLT.CREATE_DATE createDate, SLT.CREATE_BY createBy, SLT.LAST_UPDATE_DATE lastUpdateDate, SLT.LAST_UPDATE_BY lastUpdateBy FROM SOURCE_LIBRARY_T SLT
